From: 
Subject: FW: portal access (v2)/US v. Epstein 
Date: Thu, 07 Jan 2021 21:24:37 +0000 
This means it's not happening for weeks. 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, January 7, 2021 4:24 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: portal access (v2)/US v. Epstein 
The vendor has the data and is working on the upload. We had to remove the old data first. As soon as the data has been 
uploaded I will let you know. 
Thank youj 
From:
Sent: Thursday, January 7, 2021 4:07 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: portal access (v2)/US v. Epstein 
HI NE, 
Any update on the status of this upload? Our team is hoping to start reviewing these documents ASAP. 
Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Monday, December 28, 2020 10:46 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: portal access (v2)/US v. Epstein 
Great, thank you. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, December 28, 2020 10:46 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: portal access (v2)/US v. Epstein 
Not a problem. I will have the vendor remove the data from Relativity and replace it with this new data set. I will let you 
know if there are any questions. 
Thank you. 
EFTA00013296

From: 
Sent: Monday, December 28, 2020 9:52 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: portal access (v2)/US v. Epstein 
Yes please, thanks very much. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, December 23, 2020 2:04 PM 
To: 
Subject: FW: portal access (v2)/US v. Epstein 
Hello 
It took a while to get this data off of their FTP site but I was able to download all of this data from the vendor. I am 
assuming that you would like to remove the Florida scanned data that is currently in Relativity and replace it with the new 
data that the vendor sent to us correct? 
Thank you. 
From:
Sent: Friday, December 11, 2020 10:28 AM 
To: 
Subject: portal access (v2) 
has shared the 
folder SDNY with you. 
Note From 
Good morning 
I'm trying to send you the portal access again. I 
went ahead and had all of the data uploaded 
into this portal for you - please let me know if 
you don't prefer this access and I will add to a 
hard drive and overnight it instead. 
EFTA00013297

ShareFile is a tool for 
sending, receiving, and 
organizing your business 
files online. It can be used as 
a password-protected area 
for sharing information with 
clients and partners, and it's 
an easy way to send files 
that are too large to e-mail. 
Trouble with the above link? You can copy and paste the following URL into your 
web 
browser: 
You may now get this email twice but this is the portal access to see all of the uploaded data. Please let me know 
if you have any access problems. 
CFO & Director of Operations 
Melken Solutions, LLC Oviedo. FL 32765 
Success For Your Mission Is Our Mission! 
The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified in message only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party, without 
a written consent of the sender. If you received this message by mistake, please reply to this message and follow with its deletion, so that we can ensure such a mistake does not 
occur in the future. 
EFTA00013298
